text: When they announced they were filing for divorce four months ago, Sonia Granados insisted her relationship with Nick Pendergrast was'still a love story ', but she is singing a different tune now that his new girlfriend is nine weeks pregnant with twins. Sonia, 34, and Nick, 33, said'I do'as strangers on the reality series Married at First Sight, and in March they revealed their decision to separate and file for divorce after almost a year of marriage. Just three months after their divorce was finalized, Nick is expecting twins with his girlfriend and former love coach, Heather Yerrid, and after being blindsided by the surprise baby news, Sonia took to Twitter to say he was pretending to try to work things out with her while seeing his new love. Say what? Sonia Granados, 34,
